# optimization.solvers.__init__

**Source:** `src\optimization\solvers\__init__.py`

## Module Overview

Optimization solvers and interfaces for different optimization libraries.
This module provides unified interfaces to various optimization solvers
including SciPy optimizers, commercial solvers, and custom implementations
for control system parameter tuning.

```{literalinclude} ../../../src/optimization/solvers/__init__.py

```
